Welcome to the Documentation

API is available at https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/
Here is a list of api endpoints:

method: search?rollno={rollnumber}
return value: JSON of a table with two keys head and body.
head contains the headers of the table.
body contains the body of the table.
Usage:
https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/search?rollno=17101 to get the result of a single student
https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/search?rollno=171% to get the result of all students who are studying in civil branch of 2017-2021 batch.
Supports SQL like pattern matching.

method: {rollnumber}
return value: JSON
Return the complete result of a student with given rollnumber.
Keys: head,body,fname (father's name),name,rollno
If rollnumber is invalid then name is null.
Usage:
https://nithp.herokuapp.com/api/17101/

method: {rollnumber}/{semester} return Value : JSON
Similar to above method, but returns result of a single semester only. If semester is invalid then body is empty

method: cgpi/{rollnumber}
return value: A float.
If rollnumber is invalid, returns a null value
